  • Constructor Details

    • CustomScalarType

      public CustomScalarType​(CustomScalarDefinition customScalarDefinition)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the GraphQL type
      packageName - The package where the Java type for this class is stored
      classSimpleName - The simple name for this class
      graphQLScalarTypeClass - The full class name for this GraphQLScalarType. Optional.
      graphQLScalarTypeStaticField - The full path for the static field name that contains this GraphQLScalarType. Optional.
      graphQLScalarTypeGetter - The full path for the static method name that returns this GraphQLScalarType. Optional.
      pluginConfiguration - The current GraphQLConfiguration
      See Also:
